Text: Is this the SKY coverage with pre/post shows? Thanks!

It is sky. Check the tag. Plus it is long enough to include pre and post quali. Use your damn brain.

@SMCGILL1969, dude, please!, stop bloating the file size.

3500 to 4000Kbps is the max you should go with a 720p file. 

CABAC= No?. Why?. Seriously?.

Why encode using VBR?. Now wonder why the size is bloated.

Audio is prefect imo.

4 to 4.5gB should be the max file size. This 5.88 is a fucking bloat.

Still, Thanks. Hope to see you improve your next rip!.

To quote your own comment on your Geekbench upload;


"Viciously at 2012-10-14 19:03 CET:
A '+1' and 'Thanks' would be appreciated. :)"

;)

Clearly, I dont upload much here and what I did, hasn't received any criticism, not that it would because I know my game.

As for +1, that feature is gone now. :p

As for Thanks, I wrote it. It's a genuine thanks. 

Stop using Apple OS. geez :p

Thanks a bunch - for your other upload ;) . 

The smaller file is the perfect size for me, with a fresh torrent I'm dying to watch .
This one would take me forever to get; no offense .

@Viciously - I'm just yanking your chain! ;) 

Please note, I also upload the same broadcast(s) as a 640x352 avi...

Well, I am not yanking your chain.

Just finished downloading it.

For 5.88gig or even half of it, I cant accept this.

Nothing more to say.
Ah well, you can please some of the people all of the time, you can please all of the people some of the time, but you can’t please all of the people all of the time...
thanks a lot smcgill1969 , really appreciate your upload , ;D

thanks a lot smcgill1969 , really appreciate it .
please tell me that u gonna upload the race tomorrow quickly as u uploaded the qualy and in glorious HD ? if that is the case , i wanna hug you :D

Quality isn't great for a 6gig file, looks like Vaseline was smeared over the lens :( Though I'd downloaded the SD version by mistake! 

Still it's only Qualifying, hopefully the bugs can be ironed out for the race! I do appreciate all F1  I can get my hands on honestly, will be watching this asap!

people have some manners please, thank the guy firsy for his awesome work and then if u have a comment about the quality be gentle and dont act like childs, ok? 

thanks again smcgill1969 don't let this childs bother u, i am waiting for your race upload today :-) 

cheers

hey smcgill1969,

thx for this.. now that hannibal @ thebox stopped uploading full SKY coverage there arent many option left, so your upload is highly appreciated!
comment:
the video quality is poor, I don't know which setting you use.. but I recommend using either Handbrake or Megui to encode the video..
use a HIGH 4.0-4.1 profile with more ref frames! pref 4-5. CABAC is a must.. and use a CRF value of 18-19 at max .. you dont need more for 720p, also dont use VBR.

just download FAIRPLAY's version of the qually and compare quality ;)

thanks again for ur effort!

cheers
oh I forgot, download FFDSHOW and encode with x264 codec!
Thank you so much for sharing this! I appreciate it immensely!
when will be the race uploaded , smcgill1969 ?
